mapper.select: /* SysRoleLocale.selectLocaleList */ SELECT A.COMPANY, A.PRE_CD, B.LOCALE_CD, A.CODE, B.CODE_NM, B.REF1, B.REF2, B.REF3, B.REF4, B.REF5, A.USE_YN, A.SORT, B.MEMO, A.CREATER, A.CREATE_DT, A.CHANGER, A.CHANGE_DT, A.CHANGE_IP FROM SYS_CODE A, SYS_CODE_LOCALE B WHERE A.COMPANY = B.COMPANY AND A.PRE_CD = B.PRE_CD AND A.CODE = B.CODE AND A.PRE_CD = #{PRE_CD} AND A.CODE!='0000000000' ORDER BY A.PRE_CD , A.SORT
